org.simalliance.openmobileapi
Class SERecognizerByATR

java.lang.Object
  org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SERecognizer
      org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SERecognizerByATR

public class SERecognizerByATR
extends SERecognizer

Instances of this class can be used to find a Secure Element with a specific ATR (or ATR pattern).

Field Summary

          The maximum length of an ATR.
static int ATR_MIN_LENGTH
          The minimum length of an ATR (At least TS and t0 shall be present.

Constructor Detail

SERecognizerByATR

public SERecognizerByATR(byte[] atr,
                         byte[] mask)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
Initializes a new instance of the SERecognizerByATR class.

Parameters:
atr - A byte array containing the ATR bytes values that are searched for.
mask - A byte array containing an AND-mask to be applied to the Secure Element ATR values before to be compared with the searched value.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - when either the ATR or the Mask parameters have an invalid length, or if they are null.
Method Detail

isMatching

public boolean isMatching(Session session)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
If the ATR length is correct, masks it and compares it with the expected one.

Specified by:
isMatching in class SERecognizer
Parameters:
session - The session from which the ATR will be get.
Returns:
true if the masked ATRs match, or false if either ATRs don't match or session ATR has an invalid length.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if session is null.
